But bro u think about it  when u get the car new  u have 4 coils when one dies  it means the other 3 went thru same mileage. If one give way means other 3 give way  if u replace 1 by 1  ur paying 4x the labour cost. Dont penny wise pound foolish
Ur ignition coil eg 45 bucks and u need 4. U replace 1 by 1  its 180 bucks with labour maybe 30 each time. Become 180+120=300 job.If u one shot do its only 180+30=210
Got some parts if interlinked might as well one shot  eg water pump and thermostat. Change one shunbian change the other. Save $$. Initial cost is higher but long runwise u save on labour.
